snippet.title: Disciples: Liberation First 30 Minutes of Gameplay
snippet.description:
Disciples: Liberation is a new RPG on Steam Early Access. The game combines turn based combat with heavy strategy elements and a bit of base building. 

If you enjoyed the video, be sure to like it and subscribe! 

Disciples: Liberation is a mature, dark fantasy strategy RPG with turn-based combat. Liberate the land of Nevendaar and uncover the endless stories hidden within this richly detailed world where every decision has a consequence, and every wrong move could be deadly.

Disciples: Liberation
Developer: Frima Studio
Publisher: Kalypso Media
Release Date: Fall 2021
Platforms: Windows PC

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1287840/Disciples_Liberation/

#RPG #Strategy #DarkFantasy

Check out all the latest in the world of video games, anime, and entertainment at Capsule Computers:

Website:  http://www.capsulecomputers.com.au/

iTunes: http://itunes.apple.com/au/podcast/capsule-computers-gaming-podcast/id420209683
